summary.p: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the specified number.

param.name: value
param.p: Is a value of the type double or of a type that can be implicitly converted to double.

returns.p: The smallest integer greater than or equal to value. If value is equal to NaN, NegativeInfinity, or PositiveInfinity, that value is returned.
